title: Create marriage video file app with direct viewing

requirements.text: Create a backend storage system to upload and store marriage video files with metadata including title, upload date, and file size
acceptanceCriteria: Users can upload video files to the backend
Video metadata is stored and retrievable
Backend returns video file URLs for playback

requirements.text: Build a video gallery interface that displays all uploaded marriage videos as a browsable collection with thumbnails and titles
acceptanceCriteria: Videos are displayed in a grid or list layout
Each video shows a thumbnail and title
Users can see all uploaded videos at a glance

requirements.text: Implement direct in-browser video playback with standard controls (play, pause, volume, fullscreen) without requiring downloads
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a video opens it in a video player
Video plays directly in the browser
No download required to watch videos

requirements.text: Create an upload interface where users can select and upload new marriage video files from their device
acceptanceCriteria: Upload button or drag-and-drop area is available
Users can select video files from their device
Upload progress is shown during file transfer
Newly uploaded videos appear in the gallery

requirements.text: Apply a creative visual theme with elegant styling appropriate for a marriage/wedding context, using warm and celebratory colors with refined typography and spacious layouts
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme reflects a wedding aesthetic
Overall design is cohesive and celebratory

constraints: Video files must be stored in the backend canister
Video playback must work directly in the browser without external dependencies
